title: What Heaven Looks Like - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 2/15/18
itunes:title: What Heaven Looks Like - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 2/15/18
description:
George Noory and Dr. Leo Galland discuss the insights into heaven and the afterlife he has gained while communicating with the spirit of his dead son, and whether everyone goes to heaven after they die.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
